long_description: Keep your campsite bright even after sunset. The Coleman Northstar Propane Lantern is one of the brightest lanterns on the market, and with push-button ignition, also one of the easiest to operate. Lantern outputs 1540 lumens on high setting; dimmer knob allows easy brightness adjustments. 16.4 oz. propane cylinder (not included) provides 4.3 hrs. of runtime on high, 9.25 hour runtime on low. PerfectFlow(TM) internal fuel system controls gas flow and light output. InstaStart(TM) push-button ignition means reliable lighting even in wet conditions-no matches needed. High-temperature globe resists cracking from heat; metal guard reduces rattling and protects the globe; durable porcelain ventilator regulates flame. Insta-Clip(R) tube mantles are easy to install. Coleman Northstar Propane Lantern features a folding base that offers stability when lantern is in use and low-profile storage when it's not.
short_description: Keep your campsite bright even after sunset. The Coleman Northstar Propane Lantern is one of the brightest lanterns on the market, and with push-button ignition, also one of the easiest to operate.
